title: Looking to manage/coach bronze team 2017
body: Hey guys looking to manage a ranked team in bronze with players who are interested in improving and playing teams doesn't have to be super serious but having a few games a week would be great. I've played ranked teams for a few seasons g1 being the best team rank but haven't been able to play much in s6 cause my internet sucks but would be very keen on helping others improve let me know if you would be interested and feel free to add me.

replies.body:
Hey bro i am currently in bronze 3 and i really want to improve i keep playing more but i don`t get how can i improve i like playing {{champion:27}}  {{champion:11}} and {{champion:157}}  or other jungle champions My favorite role is jungle so if you could help me add me {{item:3198}} {{item:3200}} {{item:3196}} {{item:3197}} :D :D :D
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I'm a Supp main but can scrape mid and jungle. added you IG

Hey man i am interested, i play support and am learning top keen to play in team environment!!

Already added you in client.

Hey man i am a support main but am keen to learn some top lane!! Interested :)

Aleeady added you.
If you are looking for a support, I am really keen! Want to learn and improve...
Awesome that'll be great I'll add you

Hey,
I would be super keen on this idea as I'm looking for some people to play with but also wanting to learn some new skills to help increase my play style. I main ADC with champions such as {{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:15}}. Feel free to give us an add :)
Cool man I'll get you added soon :)
